channel.title: [iPhone\Galaxy]The Hobbit
channel.description:
The hobbit is an awesome kingdoms game onling. - chat with players\alliance - strategy and tactic planning - build your cities - build troops - attack other kingdoms - join alliance
I am enjoying this game for the past 4 months, I have been playing it everyday without missing a day.
Playing it on my iPhone 4S
https://www.kabam.com/games/the-hobbit-armies#
